title: Shadow of the Colossus DEMOS (OPM, PSU, and PAL)
description:
These used to be uploaded to Megaupload but I recently obtained them from a friend. I uploaded these so that everyone will have a chance to see what the demos were like, if you're interested in hacking and exploring the older forbidden lands of Shadow of the Colossus. Enjoy! Please seed if you download. I will make sure this torrent doesn't die out because everyone deserves a chance to own these.

I RECOMMEND USING PCSX2 FOR THESE ISO FILES. I do not know anything about hacking the PS2 so please don't ask me for help on that. An emulator is where you'll get the best experience anyway.
